text: Trumbull is a town in Fairfield County, Connecticut. It borders on the cities of Bridgeport and Shelton and the towns of Stratford, Fairfield, Easton and Monroe. The population was 36,827 during the 2020 census. Trumbull has a National little league team. ==References== Category:Towns in Fairfield County, Connecticut
title: Trumbull, Connecticut
